Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.virtualview

Class VirtualCharacter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.virtualview.VirtualCharacter
Direct Known Subclasses:
VirtualCharacterWithNoEntry, VirtualCharacterWithStudents
public class VirtualCharacter extends Object
VirtualCharacter class is a simplified representation of a Character card.
